writeups.title: Memory Dump
writeups.description: We captured a memory dump from a compromised system. Can you find the hidden flag?

writeups.title: Buffer Overflow
writeups.description: A classic buffer overflow challenge. Can you control the execution flow?

writeups.title: Fake Login
writeups.description: A simple login page that looks suspicious. Can you find a way to bypass the authentication?

writeups.title: Caesar Cipher
writeups.description: The ancient Romans used this cipher to protect their messages. Can you decode this?

writeups.title: API Chaos
writeups.description: The apocalypse has begun and the APIs are in chaos! Can you find a way to access the admin panel?

writeups.title: Social Media Hunt
writeups.description: A hacker left traces on social media before the apocalypse. Can you track them down and find their secret?

writeups.title: Binary Analysis
writeups.description: A mysterious binary has been found. Can you reverse engineer it to find the hidden flag?

writeups.title: Steganography
writeups.description: A beautiful image has been provided, but something seems to be hidden inside it. Can you find the secret?

writeups.title: RSA Challenge
writeups.description: We intercepted an RSA encrypted message. The public key seems to have a weakness. Can you decrypt it?

writeups.title: Network Analysis
writeups.description: We captured some suspicious network traffic. Can you analyze the PCAP file and find what the attacker was doing?

events.name: IrisCTF
events.description:
# IrisCTF 2025

IrisCTF is a 48-hour Capture the Flag competition organized by IrisSec.

I was with the team N0rm1n3tte with 2 other members. we got 120/1538 place.

![Rank](rank.png)

## Writeups

- [Password Manager](./password-manager/wu.md)
- [KittyCrypt](./KittyCrypt/wu.md)
- [Sqlate](./sqlate/wu.md)
- [wheres-bobby](./wheres-bobby/wu.md)

More writeups will be added soon.
